item.title: Openvpn Manager
item.description: What to do OpenVPN is an open-source VPN software commonly used in universities, workplaces or even homelabs. I always liked using it and it actually taught me a lot regarding certificates (it used to be shipped with easy-rsa), networking, routing etc… At the time I started to need to use it at scale for my lab I couldn’t find any tool with a web interface. I seems everybody just loved to make their own script to add new users and well… so did I.
